physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Echocardiography examination was normal, except for mild tricuspid regurgitation and a slightly enlarged RV diameter (29 mm) from 1999 onward.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient experienced many VF episodes that were terminated by the ICD and were resistant to antiarrhythmic drugs. The incidence of delivered shocks increased, up to 129 appropriate shocks in 5 months in 2001, leading to cardiac transplantation in February 2002.
